page.title: 03Paddock Lane Farm, Heatley.
page.content: The farmer's name is Eric Jennings and he lives and works on the farm. The house was built in{1717.}He has lived there for 41 years.He grows potatoes, barley, corn, wheat, hay and vegetables.They are planted between March and November and harvested as they ripen. He has many machines such as corn drills, tractors, potato elavators and a combine harvester,but he still harvests all the vegetables except the potatoes by hand.Only three men work on the farm.Father, son and nephew share all the jobs between them.The vegetables are sold immediately, but some of the potatoes and the grain are stored.There are no longer any animals on the farm because the fields are so far apart and there was too much road work involved in milking the cows.
